triples.name: Prosocial behavior
triples.relevance: The paper reviews and analyzes different definitions and concepts of prosocial behavior, which is the central subject of the review.

triples.name: Altruism
triples.relevance: The paper examines altruism as a related concept to prosocial behavior and explores how definitions differ in their treatment of altruism.

triples.name: Welfare
triples.relevance: The paper emphasizes the promotion of welfare in others as a common element across definitions of prosocial behavior.
